text:
@CNN @ChrisCuomo Did @ChrisCuomo actually have #COVID19?
If he did why did he think it was ok to break #quarantine and goto his other posh property?
Why should we listen to a man who breaks quarantine, when it comes to staying home?

May be its only ok when you are related to @NYGovCuomo? #RT
